tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ab_testing (
  experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  group_id INT,
  variant VARCHAR(255),
  conversion BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ab_tests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  test_description TEXT,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  test_group INT
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  user_segment VARCHAR(20),
  goal_achieved BOOLEAN,
  test_variation VARCHAR(20),
  test_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE test_variations (
  variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT,
  variation_name VARCHAR(50),
  variation_description TEXT,
  variation_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    campaign_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE ab_test_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    variation VARCHAR(10),
    conversion BOOLEAN,
    test_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE user_data (user_id INT, name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE experiment_a (experiment_id INT, user_id INT, group_id INT, experiment_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE experiment_b (experiment_id INT, user_id INT, group_id INT, experiment_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE experiment_results (result_id INT, experiment_id INT, user_id INT, group_id INT, conversion_rate FLOAT, session_duration INT, revenue DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (campaign_id INT, experiment_id INT, campaign_name VARCHAR(255), clicks INT, impressions INT, conversion_rate FLOAT);
